extends Object
implements ExecutionObserver

      • registerExecutionListener

        public void registerExecutionListener(ExecutionListener executionListener)
        Registers the ExecutionListener object for this task. This object will be notified about important events during the task execution.
        Parameters:
        executionListener - the object to be notified for important events during the task execution

      • unregisterExecutionListener

        public void unregisterExecutionListener(ExecutionListener executionListener)
        Unregisters the ExecutionListener object for this environment. This object will no longer be notified about important events during the task execution.
        Parameters:
        executionListener - the lister object to be unregistered
